00007 using System;
00008 using System.Linq;
00009 using System.Collections.Generic;
00010 using System.Text;
00011 using System.Drawing;
00012 using System.Reflection;
00013 using System.Windows.Forms;
00014 
00015 namespace Msdn.UIFramework
00016 {
00017     public class Canvas : UIElement
00018     {        
00019         private VisualCollection children;      
00020         private Control host;
00021 
00022         public Canvas()          
00023         {
00024             this.children = new VisualCollection(this);
00025             ApplicationPath = System.IO.Path.GetDirectoryName
00026                     (System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetName().CodeBase);
00027         }
00028 
00029         public Canvas(Control host) : this()
00030         {
00031             this.host = host;            
00032         }
00033 
00034         public T AddElement<T>(Func<T> buildFunc) where T : UIElement
00035         {
00036             if (buildFunc == null)
00037                 throw new ArgumentNullException("buildFunc");
00038 
00039             T instance = buildFunc();
00040             this.children.Add(instance as UIElement);           
00041             return instance;
00042         }
00043 
00044         internal void InvalidateChild(UIElement element)
00045         {
00046             if (this.host != null)
00047             {
00048                 this.host.Invalidate(element.Rectangle);
00049             }           
00050         }      
00051 
00052         protected override void OnRender(Graphics graphics)
00053         {
00054             // Draw a back color
00055             if (this.Background != null)
00056             {
00057                 using (Brush brush = new SolidBrush(Background))
00058                 {
00059                      graphics.FillRectangle(brush, new Rectangle(this.Left, this.Top, this.Height, this.Width));
00060                 }
00061             }
00062 
00063             // Pass the graphics objects to all UI elements
00064             for (int i = 0; i < children.Count; i++)
00065             {
00066                 UIElement element = children[i];
00067                 if (element.Visible)
00068                 {
00069                     element.Render(graphics);
00070                 }
00071             }
00072         }
00073        
00074 
00075         public VisualCollection Children
00076         {
00077             get
00078             {
00079                 return this.children;
00080             }
00081             set
00082             {
00083                 this.children = value;
00084             }
00085         }       
00086     }
00087 }
